column5: You look out the window to see this!!!!!      Freinds of a co-worker went on a long snowmobile trip on Great Slave last weekend and were still drilling through 60 inches of ice!!!!!
I think you should be banned for at least a week with pictures like that
Hey...at least the bugs aren't too bad

I know the feeling, I got home from an eternity in Toronto on Sunday night and the ice finally left our bay the following day, the grass is turning green and I spent tuesday getting my skiff ready for the opening day this saturday.  Now the weather man has issued a winter storm warning and according to the write up on the weather site, we can expect 15 cm of snow starting tomorrow through saturday.  When is it going to end?????
We had snow north of town today. many a time I have woke up to brush snow off the tent on the may long weekend trip  this sucks...I want summer
yeah but your still grillin right drifter??
Yep May 24 it should be cold and very wet this weekend
Still snowing North area?      When summer is  started?

You know it Blaque!!! I'm out grilling when it's -60!!!!! Nothing like Texas Trout done on the BBQ. Grilled up nice with liquid smoke, texmex, spicy mesquite and smoky mesquite  seasoning.  MMMMMMMMMM
something about liquid smoke just.........doesnt sound right
Don't knock it til you try it. It's just burnt tree squeezin's
six inches so far today and it's still whiteout conditions with all the highways closed
Keep that to the north Grt1...we've had rain all day but changing to snow tonight...only a couple of inches expected...bloody crap weather I say!!!!!!
